name: Abandon City Free Roam
description:
Have fun exploring this free roam abandon city game! The module is infinite. (means the map never stops). I worked about 2 days on this small game, I hope you enjoyed. (I didn't make the city module).

The picture is real gameplay!!!!

Obviously, there are bugs.

Controls:

Walk: W,A,S,D

Run: Hold down SHIFT key while walking.

Flashlight on/off: F
